question: Who among the following is not part of the Governing Council of NITI Aayog?
option1: All Chief Ministers of the states
option2: Chief Ministers of Delhi and Puducherry
option4: Lieutenant Governor of Andaman & Nicobar Island
explanation: The Governing council of NITI Aayog consists of all Chief Ministers of States (Delhi and Puducherry), Lieutenant Governor of Andaman & Nicobar Islands, and Special Invites.
